verses.verse: <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> <S%H6680>him,<s%> and commanded <S%H559>him,<s%> "You shall not <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan.<s%>

<S%H6965>Arise,<s%> <S%H3212>go<s%> to <S%H6307>Paddan<s%> <S%H1004>Aram,<s%> to the house of <S%H1328>Bethuel<s%> your <S%H517>mother<s%>'s <S%H1>father.<s%> <S%H3947>Take<s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%> from there from the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H3837>Laban,<s%> your <S%H517>mother<s%>'s <S%H251>brother.<s%>
May <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H7706>Almighty<s%> <S%H1288>bless<s%> <S%H6509>you,<s%> and make you fruitful, and <S%H7235>multiply<s%> <S%H6951>you,<s%> that you may be a company of <S%H5971>peoples,<s%>

and <S%H5414>give<s%> you the <S%H1293>blessing<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> to <S%H2233>you,<s%> and to your seed with <S%H3423>you,<s%> that you may inherit the <S%H776>land<s%> where you <S%H4033>travel,<s%> which <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> to <S%H85>Abraham.<s%>"

<S%H3327>Isaac<s%> sent <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H7971>away.<s%> He <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H6307>Paddan<s%> Aram to <S%H3837>Laban,<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1328>Bethuel<s%> the <S%H761>Syrian,<s%> <S%H7259>Rebekah<s%>'s <S%H251>brother,<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>'s and <S%H6215>Esau<s%>'s <S%H517>mother.<s%>

Now <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> had <S%H1288>blessed<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> and sent him <S%H7971>away<s%> to <S%H6307>Paddan<s%> <S%H3947>Aram,<s%> to take him a <S%H802>wife<s%> from <S%H1288>there,<s%> and that as he blessed him he gave him a <S%H6680>command,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "You shall not <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%>"
and that <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> and his <S%H517>mother,<s%> and was <S%H3212>gone<s%> to Paddan <S%H6307>Aram.<s%>
<S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%> <S%H7451>didn't<s%> <S%H5869>please<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> his <S%H1>father.<s%>

<S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H3458>Ishmael,<s%> and <S%H3947>took,<s%> besides the <S%H802>wives<s%> that he <S%H4258>had,<s%> Mahalath the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H3458>Ishmael,<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%>'s <S%H1121>son,<s%> the <S%H269>sister<s%> of <S%H5032>Nebaioth,<s%> to be his <S%H802>wife.<s%>
<S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> <S%H3318>out<s%> from <S%H3212>Beersheba,<s%> and went toward <S%H2771>Haran.<s%>

He <S%H6293>came<s%> to a certain <S%H4725>place,<s%> and stayed there all <S%H3885>night,<s%> because the <S%H8121>sun<s%> had <S%H935>set.<s%> He <S%H3947>took<s%> one of the <S%H68>stones<s%> of the <S%H4725>place,<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> it under his <S%H4763>head,<s%> and lay <S%H7901>down<s%> in that <S%H4725>place<s%> to <S%H7901>sleep.<s%>

He <S%H2492>dreamed.<s%> <S%H5551>Behold,<s%> a stairway set <S%H5324>upon<s%> the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and <S%H7218>its<s%> top <S%H5060>reached<s%> to <S%H8064>heaven.<s%> <S%H4397>Behold,<s%> the angels of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5927>ascending<s%> and descending on <S%H3381>it.<s%>

<S%H3068>Behold,<s%> Yahweh <S%H5324>stood<s%> above <S%H559>it,<s%> and said, "I am <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham<s%> your <S%H1>father,<s%> and the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3327>Isaac.<s%> The <S%H776>land<s%> whereon you <S%H7901>lie,<s%> to you will I give <S%H5414>it,<s%> and to your <S%H2233>seed.<s%>

Your <S%H2233>seed<s%> will be as the <S%H6083>dust<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and you will spread <S%H6555>abroad<s%> to the <S%H3220>west,<s%> and to the <S%H6924>east,<s%> and to the <S%H6828>north,<s%> and to the <S%H5045>south.<s%> In you and in your <S%H2233>seed<s%> will all the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H127>earth<s%> be <S%H1288>blessed.<s%>

<S%H8104>Behold,<s%> I am with you, and will keep <S%H834>you,<s%> wherever you <S%H3212>go,<s%> and will bring you <S%H7725>again<s%> into this <S%H127>land.<s%> For I will not <S%H5800>leave<s%> <S%H834>you,<s%> until I have <S%H6213>done<s%> that which I have spoken of to <S%H1696>you.<s%>"

<S%H3290>Jacob<s%> awakened out of his <S%H8142>sleep,<s%> and <S%H8104>he<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H403>"Surely<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H3426>is<s%> in this <S%H4725>place,<s%> and I <S%H3045>didn't<s%> know it."

He was <S%H3372>afraid,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "How <S%H3372>dreadful<s%> is this <S%H4725>place!<s%> This is none other than <S%H430>God<s%>'s <S%H1004>house,<s%> and this is the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven.<s%>"

<S%H3290>Jacob<s%> rose up <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H68>stone<s%> that he had <S%H7760>put<s%> under his <S%H4763>head,<s%> and set it <S%H7760>up<s%> for a <S%H4676>pillar,<s%> and <S%H3332>poured<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> on its <S%H7218>top.<s%>

He <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of that <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H1008>Bethel,<s%> <S%H199>but<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> was <S%H3870>Luz<s%> at the <S%H7223>first.<s%>

<S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H5087>vowed<s%> a <S%H5088>vow,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "If <S%H430>God<s%> will be with <S%H8104>me,<s%> and will keep <S%H8104>me<s%> in this <S%H1870>way<s%> that I <S%H1980>go,<s%> and will <S%H5414>give<s%> me <S%H3899>bread<s%> to <S%H398>eat,<s%> and clothing to put <S%H3847>on,<s%>
so that I come <S%H7725>again<s%> to my <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%> in <S%H7965>peace,<s%> and <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will be my <S%H430>God,<s%>

then this <S%H68>stone,<s%> which I have <S%H7760>set<s%> up for a <S%H4676>pillar,<s%> will be <S%H430>God<s%>'s <S%H1004>house.<s%> Of all that you will <S%H5414>give<s%> me I will <S%H6237>surely<s%> give the tenth to <S%H6237>you.<s%>"
